info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Deer Lodge and south central Powell Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Galen, or 9 miles southwest of Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Galen and Racetrack. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 181 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
